entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
